Ape hamuduruwane obawahanse araksha karanna oni, ape rate Buruwo Raja wenawa hari ma dukai.Salli pawul wadaya nisa rata kanawa.Sarath Fonseka wa gennama oni ratata.
 Mahanayaka waru ko.Rate prashna thula janathawa dawenawa ape hamuduruwane. Cardinal thumata aneka warayak Deviyanwahanse araksha karanna oni.Siyalu denama rata wenuwen, Jathiya wenuwen Sinhalayo hitaganna. comments.comment: katawanam sampurna etta ape hamuduruwane eth malwarhu asgiri depolath raja sepa nowaladawa wahsma metenta genwanna e detun pola lagatane dekum kalu watti aran oya desiya visipas denama enne ei beri okunta miriwedi sangala aran palayaw ballane kiya ghala pannanna ko oba wahanselata ethi kekkuma  wedanawa oya gon takateeru mahanayaka horunta otenta yawanna konda pana ethi taruna bikshun mahanayaka waru krala netuwa me naki padikkam purawana jontha kostala ta nayaka kam denna epa dalada maligawata weten panduru depola walin ena salli tika waladanna denna epa kaputo merunoth kaputomai enne unge malageta ehenam me mahanayaka horuntath kiya denna desa palakayo wagema mahanayaka chandetath koti ganan salli veesi krala anek hamuduruwarunge chande kolla kala evith raja sepa vinda ethi  karunakrala bahinna parata raja sepa vinda ethi baddiyatath kiyanna pallama andigama pette gewal hada akkara deke tune lrc eke idam aran waga kala ethi ekwenna satanata kiya la danmbara amila tath mohammad sangayath ara chanasara himiyan colabadee gahanna giya chiwara dariyatath kiya denna topi eda tambinta mutti elluwa ewage pratipala nisa neda me taram geri ballo hatara denek samasta ratama rate rukada nayakayoth  alle natawanne kiya ko ara kiribath goda chana nanda tera ko pitiduwe siri damma maharahatan wahanse ei nihada samadiyata sama wedilada? wahama eken uttana wenna es era balanna ko ara mepawalane ilaga rahath tera ara meerigama asspuwa krana uttanen negitinna me chabbaggiya set ekath me jatiyata sidda kala me jatika sparade wenuwen ethi nidagatta ethi despaluvanta kade giya mara ninde hitiya ethi madaklapuwe indan taniyama one man sho ekak gehawwe ampitiye sumana tera kata pana ethi nisa tamath singhlayo wenuwen ke mora gehawwe dipendar tibi nowei kabal sereppu keli dekak kakule dan evidinin ke gahanne menna niyama hamusuruwaru tawath ara nikaya me nikaya kiya kule ta kulal kaa nogena indiyawe siuw maha gangawange jalaya yamse muhudata gala  karadiyata ekatu wanneda ? e wage sema kula heenayekma pividi krawa niwan maga sadaa dunnu lowtura budunta pin sidda wenna me maha pattam aran lama tenila wage shin hadin konduramin hitiya ethi wahama bahinna benz walin parata nettam obalage nayaka pattamda kudu kra danna anekuth maha sangaya parata basithwa dusta palaka hetta nerapa herime satsnata ata denna ethi den salli weladuwa me ahinsaka kuda himiwarun chiware age watinakama pennaddi oba wahansala eke watinskamawath nodanne nam ratatath sambudda sasunatath shinhakintath itin aba saranama tama hamuduruwarune maha nayaka anu nayak warune

@‡∂Ö‡∂≠‡∑í ‡∂ú‡∂ª‡∑î Dinusha Bandu ...oya garu une kohomada samanal patiyo....uba gedarata wela sill ganin...thambiyek awith ube puke arala yanakal kariya....thopi danne gon pake kathawak kotala meke obanna witharai

‡∂Ö‡∂≠‡∑í ‡∂ú‡∂ª‡∑î Dinusha Bandu  ane me ehema idala ratawal beranna puluwanda hoda eune deshapanayak karanne  kisima wadagathkamak thathwayak nathi eunta  ohoma thama katha karanna oni shishter sampannawa dahamiwa inna hamuduru namakata  puluwan e widihata shishtersampannawa inna eunta amathanna.  deshapalanaya karana haththata  shishter sampannawa katha karala  wadakda un ta namak gamak nathi awajathaka haththak ne bro oka therenne nadda

comments.comment: Sirisena ranil obala hithak papuwak nedda.denna nidida. Obala denna hodata mathaka thiyaniw thopita pare yanna wenne na.thopi magadi hora wedak karala nissabdawa inna ketha thopita hrna Gahanna onii

comments.comment: Ehemai hanuduruwane..pahugiya kale  unpiyata  paksha pathi unata rathana   hamudurueo inna hetidekkahama eswalata kadulu awa.hahima dukai api wenuwn neda me kepa wenne.oba wahansets   dirgasu lebewa..
comments.author: Lanka Thushari

comments.comment: Apith thambiyek genalla janadipathi waranayata illanna kiyanawa.sinhala ekekta chande denne naha aththatama thopita wada ahinsaka muslim minissu hodai.rathana hamuduruwo watakara gena muslim minissu kampa wenawa.parliment eke kalakanni thopi maka bawila yanna oni.
comments.author: Judy Kulathunga
